products.title: Our Stamp Collection
products.description: Browse our extensive collection of high-quality stamps from top brands like Trodat, Shiny, MobiStamps and more.
products.noProductsFound: No products found matching your filters.
products.empty: No product found matching your query.

productDescriptions.1234: Professional rectangular stamp, perfect for office use.
productDescriptions.5678: Round blue stamp with ergonomic grip, designed for daily use.
productDescriptions.1401: Premium oval stamp for creative offices.
productDescriptions.1502: Self-inking green square stamp for high volume tasks.
productDescriptions.2023: Shiny brand rectangular stamp, built for durability.
productDescriptions.2890: Classic MobiStamp model, suitable for professional paperwork.
productDescriptions.sirdas-470: Professional self-inking dater stamp with 8 lines of text capacity.
productDescriptions.kasem-2002: Compact self-inking stamp with 5 lines of text capacity.
productDescriptions.shiny-s723: High-quality self-inking stamp with 5 lines of text capacity.
productDescriptions.shiny-s032: Round self-inking stamp with logo capability and 2 lines of text.
productDescriptions.shiny-s042: Round self-inking stamp with logo capability and 4 lines of text.
productDescriptions.wood-round-30: Classic wooden round stamp with 2 lines of text and logo capability.
productDescriptions.wood-2x5: Classic wooden rectangular stamp with 5 lines of text capacity.
productDescriptions.wood-round-40: Classic wooden round stamp with 4 lines of text and logo capability.
productDescriptions.shiny-s842: Premium self-inking stamp with 4 lines of text and logo capability.
productDescriptions.sirdas-206: Professional self-inking stamp with 7 lines of text capacity.
productDescriptions.shiny-s722: Compact self-inking stamp with 4 lines of text capacity.
productDescriptions.trodat-4914: Professional self-inking stamp with 7 lines of text capacity.
productDescriptions.trodat-4913: Compact self-inking stamp with 6 lines of text capacity. CO₂ neutral as standard.
productDescriptions.trodat-4927: Large self-inking stamp with 7 lines of text capacity. Perfect for forms and invoices.
productDescriptions.trodat-imprint-12: Versatile self-inking stamp available in various colors with 5 lines of text capacity.
productDescriptions.trodat-4912: Popular self-inking stamp with 5 lines of text capacity. CO₂ neutral as standard.
productDescriptions.mobistamps-r30: Round self-inking stamp with 2 lines of text and logo capability. Compact design.
productDescriptions.trodat-44055: Large self-inking stamp for business use with 6 lines of text capacity. CO₂ neutral as standard.
productDescriptions.sirdas-pocket-80: Pocket-sized self-inking stamp with 5 lines of text. Portable and convenient.
productDescriptions.trodat-imprint-11: Compact self-inking stamp with 4 lines of text. Available with pre-inked text options like 'PAYÉ' or 'CONFIDENTIEL'.
productDescriptions.mobistamps-4312: Self-inking stamp with 5 lines of text. Transparent body for precise positioning.
productDescriptions.mobistamps-4311: Compact self-inking stamp with 4 lines of text. Available with pre-inked text options like 'PAYÉ' or 'CONFIDENTIEL'.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Settings
accessibility.largeControlsDesc: Increases the size of buttons and controls
accessibility.keyboardTip: Tip: Use arrow keys to move selected elements when in the preview area

preview.title: Preview
preview.customizeStamp: Customize your stamp to see a preview
preview.dragInstructions: Click and drag elements to reposition them
preview.ariaLabel: Stamp preview area. Use arrow keys to position selected elements.
preview.backgroundChangedDesc: The preview background has been updated

design.welcomeDesc: Follow the step-by-step wizard to create your custom stamp
design.startWithLogoDesc: Start by inserting your logo for best results. We’ll position your text around it.
design.uploadInstructions: Click to upload an image or drag and drop it
design.uploadRecommendation: Recommended: Square PNG or SVG with transparent background
design.logoDragTip: You can also drag the logo directly on the preview area
design.logoTipText: After positioning your logo, click “Next” to add and arrange your text.
design.textOnlyDesc: Continue without a logo to create a text-only stamp
design.title: Custom Stamp Designer
design.savedDescription: Your design has been successfully saved and will be available when you return
design.loadedDescription: Your saved design has been loaded
design.saveDesignForLaterTooltip: Save your design to continue later
design.clearSavedDesignTooltip: Remove the saved design from storage
design.productInfo: Designing a {{name}} stamp ({{size}}). You can add up to {{lines}} lines of text and choose from {{inkColors}} ink colors.

designStamp.title: Design Your Professional Stamp
designStamp.subtitle: Create a clean, professional stamp with our easy-to-use designer.
designStamp.step1Description: Choose from a wide range of self-inking stamps in various sizes and styles.
designStamp.step2Description: Add your logo first, then customize the text, adjust formatting, select ink color, and add borders.
designStamp.step3Description: See an accurate preview of your stamp before adding to cart and finalizing your purchase.

preview.downloadHelp: Download your stamp design in high-quality PNG format
preview.noPreviewAvailable: No preview available at the moment

preview.instructionDragLogo: Click and drag to position the logo
preview.instructionGeneral: Select a text or logo to move elements

autoArrange.autoArrangeTooltip: Intelligently arrange the text for optimal layout based on the stamp shape, while maintaining correct orientation and spacing.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for quality self-inking stamps in Morocco. We offer a wide range of stamps for professionals and individuals.
footer.deliveryDescription: We offer free delivery for all orders in Casablanca and surrounding areas.
